column4: Please can someone tell me how to extract this file?? Legend of Zelda, The - A Link to the Past.7z.. What program do I need... I heard ubuntu had a 7zip open source ?? what does this mean? How do I Install it? I already installed Xarchive manager.. it didn't seem to work unless you know how to get it to work... I am trying to extract a .7z file.. Please help me, thank you!
p7zip. did you know you can search the repositories?
I don't know what you mean about repos
search for 7zip in synaptics or using apt-cache.
